item.title: XML Schema Definition creation: Journal - Part 3: XSLT sample
item.description: Having finished creating an XML Schema Definition for a simple journal, it was time to create a quick view of the content.

item.title: Muenchian Method grouping in XSLT
item.description: My investigations on how the Muenchian Method of grouping in XSLT 1.0 works.
